backupAndRestore.description: You can import and export your Vencord settings as a JSON file. This allows you to easily transfer your settings to another device, or recover your settings after reinstalling Vencord or Discord.
backupAndRestore.importWarning: Importing a settings file will overwrite your current settings.

clipboardNotSupported: Your browser does not support copying to clipboard

integrations.authorizationNote: This will request authorization if you have not yet set up cloud integrations.
integrations.backendNote: Which backend to use when using cloud integrations.
integrations.description: Vencord comes with a cloud integration that adds goodies like settings sync across devices. It <0>respects your privacy</0>, and the <1>source code</1> is AGPL 3.0 licensed so you can host it yourself.
integrations.eraseError: Could not erase all data (API returned {status}), please contact support.
integrations.eraseWarning: Once your data is erased, we cannot recover it. There's no going back!
integrations.reauthenticate: We've noticed you have cloud integrations enabled in another client! Due to limitations, you will need to re-authenticate to continue using them. Click here to go to the settings page to do so!

settings.description: Synchronize your settings to the cloud. This allows easy synchronization across multiple devices with minimal effort.
settings.localNewer: Your local settings are newer than the cloud ones.
settings.nothingOnline: There are no settings in the cloud.
settings.overwriteWarning: This will overwrite your local settings with the ones on the cloud. Use wisely!

syncErrorDown.api: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud (API returned {status}).
syncErrorDown.generic: Could not synchronize settings from the cloud ({error}).

syncErrorUp.api: Could not synchronize settings to the cloud (API returned {status}).
syncErrorUp.generic: Could not synchronize settings to the cloud ({error}).

settings.upToDate: Your settings are up to date.
settings.updated: Your settings have been updated! Click here to restart to fully apply changes!

errorBoundaryDescription: An error occurred while rendering this Component. More info can be found below and in your console.
failureUpdate: Uh Oh! Failed to render this Page. However, there is an update available that might fix it. Would you like to update and restart now?
gitCopyNewer: Your local copy has more recent commits. Please stash or reset them.
importedSettings: Settings successfully imported. Restart to apply changes!
noSettings: There are no settings for this plugin.

pluginContributed.one: This person has <0>contributed</0> to one plugin!
pluginContributed.zero: This person has not made any plugins. They likely <0>contributed</0> to Vencord in other ways!

pluginHeader.cogWheel: Plugins with a cog wheel have settings you can modify!
pluginHeader.iconInformation: Press the cog wheel or info icon to get more info on a plugin.
pluginHeader.reloadDescription: Restart now to apply new plugins and their settings

pluginsNeedRestart: The following plugins require a restart:
requiredPlugin: This plugin is required for Vencord to function.
settingsErrors: You must fix all errors before saving

themes.betterDiscordNote: If using the BD site, click on "Download" and place the downloaded .theme.css file into your themes folder.
themes.pasteLinks: Paste links to css files here
themes.useDirect: Make sure to use direct links to files (raw or github.io)!

update.clickToView: Click here to view the update

updaterRepeatFailed: That also failed :( Try updating or re-installing with the installer!
